pull.title: Avoid unused locals for CScript::IsWitnessProgram
pull.body: For those cases where the version and program are not useful.

rename.from: Overload CScript::IsWitnessProgram with a test-only version

events.body: Rebased, squashed, and updated to take advantage of `IsSmallInteger` from #13194
I am generally a concept NACK on changes like this; IMO the review burden for refactoring consensus-critical code typically outweighs the benefits.

events.message:
Overload CScript::IsWitnessProgram with a test-only version

For those cases where the version and program are not useful.

events.body:
> I am generally a concept NACK on changes like this; IMO the review burden for refactoring consensus-critical code typically outweighs the benefits.

Agree, seems to risky, closing.
